ANDS-Grants.description: Tbe obesity pandemic has been described by leading researchers as a problem out of control, with lifestyle interventions generally resulting in regain of treatment-induced weight losses. The present study will evaluate the effectiveness of motivational enhancement therapy (MET) for both patients and their support partners in helping obese patients to achieve long-term weight losses by sustaining their motivation for making difficult lifestyle changes over time.
ANDS-Grants.title: The Effectiveness of Motivational Enhancement Therapy for Obese Patients and Support Partners
funder: National Health and Medical Research Council
